name: Get The Whale
description:
An unknown beast, a crew of madmen and a pursuit on unknown waters. Go beyond. Get the whale.

A - slide left

D - slide right

W - increase velocity

S - decrease velocity

Mouse movement - up,  down, right, left

Space - Speed boost (when it's full)

Programming : Sara Jujeczka https://twitter.com/sara_jujeczka

3D art: Michał Klekowicki https://twitter.com/M_Klekowicki

Music: Mikołaj Frąckowiak

Entry for GameDevNetwork: Dragon Jam 2017.
